channel.title: Chapter 2: Supervised Regression on Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing (DL4NLP)
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 2: Supervised Regression on Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing (DL4NLP)

item.title: Chapter 02.01: Loss Functions for Regression
item.description: \(L1\) and \(L2\) are two essential loss functions used for evaluating the performance of regression models. This section defines \(L1\) and \(L2\) loss and explains the differences.
